title: Establishes that the application of a limited amount of pesticides does not qualify as a commercial application of a pesticide
summary: Establishes that the application of a limited amount of pesticides does not qualify as a commercial application of a pesticide.
fulltext:
S T A T E   O F   N E W   Y O R K
       ________________________________________________________________________

                                          252

                              2011-2012 Regular Sessions

                                   I N  S E N A T E

                                      (PREFILED)

                                    January 5, 2011
                                      ___________

       Introduced  by  Sen. MAZIARZ -- read twice and ordered printed, and when
         printed to be committed to the Committee on Environmental Conservation

       AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation  to  the
         application of pesticides

         THE  PEOPLE OF THE STATE OF NEW YORK, REPRESENTED IN SENATE AND ASSEM-
       BLY, DO ENACT AS FOLLOWS:

    1    Section 1. Subdivision 11 of  section  33-0101  of  the  environmental
    2  conservation  law,  as  added  by  chapter  612  of the laws of 1983, is
    3  amended to read as follows:
    4    11. "Commercial application" means any application  of  any  pesticide
    5  except  as  defined in private or residential application of pesticides.
    6  "COMMERCIAL APPLICATION" SHALL NOT INCLUDE  THE  AERIAL  APPLICATION  OF
    7  LESS THAN SIXTEEN OUNCES OF PESTICIDE.
    8    S 2. This act shall take effect immediately.






        EXPLANATION--Matter in ITALICS (underscored) is new; matter in brackets
                             [ ] is old law to be omitted.
                                                                  LBD01597-01-1
actClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to the application of pesticides
